summary: Core Valentine prompt/reveal UI and romantic styling appear to be implemented in frontend/src/App.tsx and frontend/src/index.css, including an evasive “No” behavior and a “Yes” reveal with a statically referenced meme image path. However, the required static image asset itself is not present in the diff, and the reveal text shown in the UI does not clearly match the exact “Good choice❤️” requirement. The diff also introduces unrelated Internet Identity/auth and backend actor files that were not requested and may violate stated constraints/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: On “Yes”, display a celebratory reveal that displays a meme-style image containing the text “Good choice❤️”.
missing_requirements.reason: The reveal heading shown in code is "Good choice" (without the heart character) and the diff does not provide evidence that the image content itself contains the exact caption “Good choice❤️”.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (renders heading text "Good choice" and an image with alt="Good choice")
